add_to_chrome_extend.message: Add to Chrome Trustnav Adblock to protect it!

app_description.message: Trustnav protects you from accessing dangerous websites and unwanted ads.

app_long_description.message:
SafeSearch by Trustnav checks every search result or website, allowing you to browse the internet safely and worry-free.

If the domain or website in your search results is rated as unsafe, this extension will warn you before visiting the site. This helps protect you from credit card theft, accidentally giving your password to hackers, and from downloading ransomware or malware.

This extension protects you by changing the Default Search in Google Chrome™.

By installing SafeSearch by Trustnav you accept the following ToS and Privacy Policy: www.trustnav.com/privacy
